row: Each row represents one comparison showing the number of differentially expressed genes (DEGs) used to recreate the bar chart.

columns.name: Comparison
columns.description: the specific biological comparison, for example Trem2KO prion versus Trem2KO NBH

columns.name: Pval005
columns.description: count of genes with p value < 0.005

columns.name: FDR005
columns.description: count of genes with adjusted p value < 0.05

notes: The figure was digitized manually and numerical values were extracted to reproduce Figure 6B.
The four comparisons are Trem2KO prion vs Trem2KO NBH, Trem2KO prion vs WT prion, Trem2KO NBH vs WT NBH, and WT prion vs WT NBH.
Values reflect number of significant genes at each threshold and are not raw sequencing counts.
